paragraph: Jung Hye-young (born December 14, 1973) is a South Korean actress. She is a part of the YG Entertainment group and is best known for her roles in Korean television dramas.
In 2004, Jung married Sean Noh, a member of hip-hop duo Jinusean. They have four children - two daughters and two sons.
Today, the More I Love You (essays, 2008)
